data.title: Cost of Attendance
data.meta_description: Westminster education expenses include tuition, fees (fee schedule), room, and board.
data.text:
Westminster education expenses include tuition, fees (fee schedule), room, and board. Westminster is a residential campus, and students must live in on-campus housing unless they meet off campus residency requirements.

Please check out our Payment Policies.

Direct Costs: 2024-2025 School Year (on-campus)
